Entries.5599039/Hn AquariumDonated:RainbowTrout/: 50s/45 9/Jasper 53 9 0 farmer 37 11 1/skippable/move farmer 10 0 1/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Jasper 3/emote Jasper 32/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Jasper 2/move farmer 0 -2 1/faceDirection Jasper 3/speak Jasper "Good day, @. I was just admiring these fine fish.$1#$b#The rainbow trout is a fascinating species, you know."/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Jasper "The female returns to the same spawning point from which she herself hatched.#$b#With her tail, she digs a nest in the gravel, and into this she lays her eggs.#$b#The male swims over them, fertilizing them, after which she buries them and the two depart."/faceDirection Jasper 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Jasper "During this process, many pebbles get dislodged.#$b#Once I even found a fragment of rainbow-colored rock; the legendary prismatic shard.$1"/jump farmer 4/emote farmer 16/pause 1500/faceDirection Jasper 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Jasper 3/speak Jasper "It is quite poetic, don't you think? A rainbow fish unveiling a rainbow stone?$3"/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Jasper 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/end
